description: This is related to bug #984219.  While it is setting the launched_at date in the db now, it is still getting the old data in the notification being sent out.  (also, there is a  missing backstop exists event on rebuild, which is needed, along with proper launch dates to calculate uptime)
title: Launched_at date incorrect on notifications for resize, rebuild.

comments.content: This is related to bug #984219.  While it is setting the launched_at date in the db now, it is still getting the old data in the notification being sent out.  (also, there is a  missing backstop exists event on rebuild, which is needed, along with proper launch dates to calculate uptime)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mdragon

commit 1bee4db0e2bbe0067f811974b1b24e83a7f1af6b
Author: Monsyne Dragon <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Apr 26 22:22:53 2012 +0000

    Fixes bug 989271, fixes launched_at date on notifications.
    
    Also adds unittests to prevent regression of bug 984219,
    and adds missing backstop compute.instance.exists event.
